item.description:
Join us for an evening of education from a business savvy legal team! Come learn about how to protect your Intellectual Property, and learn to leverage your assets and anticipate problems with this seminar including:

1- Patents: What is protectable, how much does it cost, and what protection do you really get

2 - Trademarks: What's in a name, how to cover yourself, and how to make money by leveraging brand.

3 - Copyright Protection: When should you get one, Why you should get one, and common problems in copyright law

4 - Trade Secret: Get the basics on this misunderstood and highly valuable area of law. You might just discover that you have a trade secret to leverage

5 - Licensing IP


PRESENTERS:

Steven Shapiro, Esq: Trademarks

Shannon Jamieson: Copyright

Christopher Marston, Esq: Patent & Trade Secret
item.name: IP Seminar: Basics of Patent, Trademark, and Copyright Protection
